incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 01/08/2025 09:00 UTC End time : 01/08/2025 11:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer. Thank you for your understanding

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 04/08/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 07/08/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : During the maintenance, vSphere won't be accessible and hosts will be put in maintenance mode for 1 hour. vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our vSphere offer. An individual communication will be done to inform customers. Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager. Thank you for your understanding

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 04/08/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 07/08/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : During the maintenance, vSphere won't be accessible and hosts will be put in maintenance mode for 1 hour. vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our vSphere offer. An individual communication will be done to inform customers. Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager. Thank you for your understanding

This maintenance has been re-scheduled. Below you can find new information regarding the operation. As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 11/08/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 21/08/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on their datastore. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple storage servers. Thank you for your understanding.
